tool_description: BoldSign offers a wide range of REST APIs that allow you to seamlessly integrate the complete sending and signing process within your applications. Learn more about [BoldSign eSignature APIs](https://boldsign.com/esignature-api/?utm_source=rapidapi&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=boldsign).
name: BoldSign
title: BoldSign

required_parameters.name: attachmentId
required_parameters.description: Attachment Id(Get attachment ID from Properties API).

optional_parameters.name: onBehalfOf
optional_parameters.description: The on behalfof email address.

api_list.name: BehalfDocuments

required_parameters.name: Page
required_parameters.description: Page index specified in get document list request (cursor).

optional_parameters.name: PageSize
optional_parameters.description: Page size specified in get document list request.

optional_parameters.name: StartDate
optional_parameters.description: The start date used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents that were created on or after this date

optional_parameters.name: Labels
optional_parameters.description: A list of labels or tags used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents that have been tagged with one or more of the labels provided in this list

optional_parameters.name: Status
optional_parameters.description: Filter documents based on their current status, including In-progress, Completed, Declined, Expired, and Revoked.

optional_parameters.name: EndDate
optional_parameters.description: The end date used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents that were created on or before this date.

optional_parameters.name: PageType
optional_parameters.description: The filter used to differentiate between documents sent on the user's behalf and documents sent by the user on behalf of others. The API will return documents based on the specified value.

optional_parameters.name: Signers
optional_parameters.description: A list of signer email addresses used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents where the signer's email address matches one of the email addresses provided in this list

optional_parameters.name: SearchKey
optional_parameters.description: The search key used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents that contain the search key in the document title, document ID, sender or signer(s) name, etc.

optional_parameters.name: EmailAddress
optional_parameters.description: The sender identity's email used to filter the documents returned in the API. The API will return documents that were sent on behalf of the specified email address.

optional_parameters.name: onBehalfOf
optional_parameters.description: The on behalfof email address.

TeamDocuments

required_parameters.name: Page
required_parameters.description: Page index specified in get document list request.

optional_parameters.name: Labels
optional_parameters.description: Labels of the document.

optional_parameters.name: TeamId
optional_parameters.description: TeamId  of the  Team document.

optional_parameters.name: TransmitType
optional_parameters.description: Transmit type as Sent, Received and Both.

optional_parameters.name: Status
optional_parameters.description: Status of the document such as In-progress, Completed, Decline, Expired, Revoked, Draft.

optional_parameters.name: SearchKey
optional_parameters.description: Documents can be listed by the search key present in the document like document title, document ID, sender or recipient(s) name, etc.,

optional_parameters.name: PageSize
optional_parameters.description: Page size specified in get document list request.

optional_parameters.name: UserId
optional_parameters.description: UserId of the  Team document.

optional_parameters.name: StartDate
optional_parameters.description: Start date of the document

optional_parameters.name: EndDate
optional_parameters.description: End date of the document

api_list.name: /v1/plan/apiCreditsCount
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boldsign.p.rapidapi.com/v1/plan/apiCreditsCount"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boldsign.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boldsign.p.rapidapi.com/v1/plan/apiCreditsCount"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boldsign.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
